rules_text:
When Asphodel Gravedealer dies, choose one –
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
• Create a Treasure token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
notes:
CN24: ETB mill three create Treasure —> dies, +1/+1 counter or create Treasure
The Returned trade the riches useless to the dead for whatever can remind them of life. 
Iga Oliwiak
Stilonihiya SPHINX alt art
token triggers should check for ETB instead of creation in cases where an effect makes more than one
